name: autozap
description: AutoZap - atendimento WhatsApp com Next.js + desktop (macOS/Windows) + Firebase + WhatsApp Cloud API
author: Nycolazs

scripts.desktop:dev: cross-env AUTOZAP_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3000 AUTOZAP_SERVER_MANAGED_EXTERNALLY=1 concurrently -k "npm run dev" "wait-on tcp:3000 && electron ./electron/main.js"
scripts.desktop:start: npm run desktop:config:local && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production FRONTEND_REQUIRE_DESKTOP=1 electron ./electron/main.js
scripts.desktop:pack: npm run desktop:config:local && npm run build && electron-builder --dir
scripts.desktop:dist:mac: npm run desktop:config:local && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip
scripts.desktop:dist:win: npm run desktop:config:local && npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis zip
scripts.desktop:dist:win:x64: npm run desktop:config:local && npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis zip --x64 -c.win.signAndEditExecutable=false
scripts.desktop:dist:mac:cloud: npm run desktop:config:cloud && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip
scripts.desktop:dist:win:cloud: npm run desktop:config:cloud && npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis zip
